title: Is it sinful to use someone's credit card to buy halal things? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: uh so she a brother was given a credit card by someone else to use it and to buy whatever he wants with it he was in doubt because the credit card is in halal is it permissible for him to use his credit card or not the credit card doesn't belong to him but it belongs to the other person as long as he's going to use it to buy a Halal product with it and at the same time refund the money the actual amount that he bought it with to the owner of the credit card it's not his downfall it's not his responsibility whether he's going to pay it in installments or pay interest over it or not there's no problem on you in using that credit card you bought an amount of a hundred dollars you take the hundred dollars and give it to the owner of the credit card and the rest is his problem and Allah Knows Best
